types.html:
à ce stade

  1. at this point, at this juncture, at this stage
    À ce stade, ce n'est plus de la détermination, c'est de l'obsession. ― At this point, it's no longer determination, it's obsession.
trans: at this point, at this juncture, at this stage

title: à ce stade
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /a sə stad/
